name: Opposites Subtract
description:
Opposites Subtract
By: Nate Mills (LordBrom)
Created for the 2021 Yogscast Jingle Jam Game Jam.
Jam Theme: Opposites

"A super simple puzzle game where you push opposite blocks together to find the exit for each level."

Controls:
W/A/S/D or Arrow keys: Move the "you" block.
R: Reloads the current level
ESC: Opens pause menu

My first game jam, with my first actual (not just following tutorial) game.

Credits:
Level Design: Nate Mills, Ian Warnes
Sounds: mixkit.co

Created using Unity.
